semantic_title: External Cause Code Selection Using Alphabetic Index and Tabular List
section_path: Chapter 20: External Causes of Morbidity > a. General External Cause Coding Guidelines > 5) The selection of the appropriate external cause code

content.full_text: The selection of the appropriate external cause code is guided by the Alphabetic Index of External Causes and by Inclusion and Exclusion notes in the Tabular List. (Evidence: pg no: 88, L38-L40)
content.summary: External cause code selection follows standard ICD-10-CM methodology using the Alphabetic Index of External Causes and Tabular List notes (Evidence: pg no: 88, L38-L40)
key_concepts: Use Alphabetic Index of External Causes (Evidence: pg no: 88, L39)
Follow Inclusion and Exclusion notes (Evidence: pg no: 88, L39-L40)
Standard ICD-10-CM selection methodology (Evidence: pg no: 88, L38-L40)

detailed_rules.rule_text: External cause code selection is guided by the Alphabetic Index of External Causes (Evidence: pg no: 88, L38-L39)
detailed_rules.explanation: The specialized Alphabetic Index of External Causes provides the primary guidance for identifying appropriate external cause codes (Evidence: pg no: 88, L38-L39)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Use Inclusion and Exclusion notes in the Tabular List for final code selection (Evidence: pg no: 88, L39-L40)
detailed_rules.explanation: After identifying potential codes in the index, the Tabular List inclusion and exclusion notes provide definitive guidance for appropriate code selection (Evidence: pg no: 88, L39-L40)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Look up external cause in Alphabetic Index of External Causes
Step 2: Identify potential code(s) from index
Step 3: Verify code in Tabular List
Step 4: Review Inclusion and Exclusion notes
Step 5: Select most appropriate code based on documentation

warnings: Must use both Alphabetic Index and Tabular List (Evidence: pg no: 88, L38-L40)
best_practices: Always verify codes in Tabular List (Evidence: pg no: 88, L39-L40)
Review inclusion and exclusion notes carefully (Evidence: pg no: 88, L39-L40)
common_mistakes: Coding directly from index without Tabular List verification (Evidence: pg no: 88, L38-L40)
tips: Use specialized External Causes index (Evidence: pg no: 88, L39)
implementation_notes: Standard ICD-10-CM methodology applies to external causes
clinical_context: Accurate external cause coding requires proper reference use
